name: Introduction to Computer Engineering
description: Introduction to computer systems, hardware and software. Overview of computer engineering profession. Problem solving and algorithm development. Introduction to programming.

name: Computer Programming I
description: Fundamental programming concepts. Variables, data types, operators. Control structures: selection and iteration. Functions and parameter passing. Arrays and strings. Introduction to C programming language.

name: Data Structures and Algorithms
description: Abstract data types. Arrays, linked lists, stacks, queues. Trees and graphs. Sorting and searching algorithms. Algorithm complexity analysis. Hash tables.

name: Machine Learning
description: Introduction to machine learning. Supervised learning algorithms. Unsupervised learning. Neural networks and deep learning. Model evaluation and validation.

name: Artificial Intelligence
description: AI fundamentals. Search algorithms. Knowledge representation. Logic and reasoning. Planning. Natural language processing. Expert systems.
